products.title: Splash Frost Roller Blind
products.description: Splash frost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Splash frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

products.title: Splash Paper White Roller Blind
products.description: Splash paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Their splash paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe.

products.title: Splash Snow White Roller Blind
products.description: Add a bit of style to your home with this fabulous cream roller blind. Product id: sdb-rbx1578 fabric colour: snow material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash snow white roller blind in white.

products.title: Splash Ivory Off-white Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Ivory off-white is a fabulous shade, perfect to pair with natural wooden tones in the home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

The sweet birds soar high in the skies, scattering against the mist of grey. products.title: Splash Snow White Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Perfect fit roller blinds clip straight onto the window, which provides a hassle free, no drilling way to update your window. The framework comes in 4 different shades to match your window frame. This fabric is also moisture resistant making it the perfect choice for bathrooms and kitchens.

products.title: Splash Paper White Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash paper white perfect fit roller blind is perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this offf-white perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Frost Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash frost perfect fit roller blinds are a beautiful, fresh & crisp white colour. They are particularly well suited to kitchens and bathrooms as the fabric is moisture resistant. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any window. The blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly onto the window, which means no drilling. The framework is also available in 4 different colour options to compliment any room.
